ello again!!

did you copy the cracks to the respective folders?

Copy standalone crack(s) to your installation dir.
Copy VST cracks to your VSTPlugins dir.
Copy VST3 cracks to your VST3 dir.
Run MDrummerConfiguration first.

what is you system?

here you have the new update
